statements: DELETE FROM quantum_metadata WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' AND algorithm_name = 'Grover';
DELETE FROM quantum_metadata WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' AND experiment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM quantum_metadata WHERE algorithm_name = 'Grover' AND experiment_id = '47f6cd54-63ac-4e00-bc6f-551344b33a91';
DELETE FROM experiment_metadata WHERE experiment_id = 100 AND algorithm_id = 2;
DELETE FROM quantum_algorithms WHERE algorithm_id = 3 AND created_by_user = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM experiment_metadata WHERE algorithm_id = 2 OR experiment_id = 10;
